schemes.name: Karnataka Raitha Suraksha Pradhana Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides insurance coverage and financial support to farmers in the event of crop loss due to natural calamities.
schemes.benefits: Compensation for crop loss caused by drought, flood, pests and other natural risks.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers growing notified crops in Karnataka. Enrollment through Gram One or CSC centers.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply via State Portal, Gram One or CSC centers.

schemes.name: Distribution of Quality Seeds on Subsidy
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides quality certified seeds to farmers at subsidized rates to improve productivity.
schemes.benefits: Reduced seed cost and improved crop yield.

schemes.name: Krishi Bhagya Scheme
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Supports irrigation through farm ponds, water harvesting structures and protective irrigation.
schemes.benefits: Improved water availability and drought resilience.

schemes.name: Customized Hiring Service Centre (Krishi Yantra Dhare)
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides agricultural machinery and equipment on rental basis through hobli-level centres.
schemes.benefits: Reduces cost of farm mechanization for small and marginal farmers.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply via Department app or District Agriculture Office.

schemes.name: Farm Mechanisation Programme
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidies for purchasing agricultural machinery.
schemes.benefits: 50% subsidy for general farmers and up to 90% for SC/ST farmers.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers in Karnataka, subsidy limits apply.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply via District Agriculture Office or Agri Portal.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (Micro Irrigation)
schemes.description: Supports installation of drip and sprinkler irrigation systems.
schemes.benefits: Water efficiency and increased crop productivity.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply online or through District Agriculture Office.
